*In [[2000 in music|2000]] [[Comedian]] [[Stephen Lynch (comedian)|Stephen Lynch]] released a song called ''A Month Dead'' about a necrophiliac who's lover is beginning to smell on his only studio album to date entitled ''[[A Little Bit Special]].''
*In [[2000 in music|2000]] [[Comedian]] [[Stephen Lynch (comedian)|Stephen Lynch]] released a song called ''A Month Dead'' about a necrophiliac who's lover is beginning to smell on his only studio album to date entitled ''[[A Little Bit Special]].''
*In [[2003]] the Colorado based humor-horror punk band [[Crackula]] recorded a song entitled "NecroFeelin'" about a necrophilic love affair.
*In [[2003]] the Colorado based humor-horror punk band [[Crackula]] recorded a song entitled "NecroFeelin'" about a necrophilic love affair.
  +
*In [[2005]] New York-based author [[Supervert]] published the book [http://supervert.com/necrophilia_variations Necrophilia Variations], a literary monograph on the erotic attraction to corpses and death.
*British Grindcore band 'Raging Speedhorn' wrote a song called 'Necrophiliac glue-sniffer'.
*British Grindcore band 'Raging Speedhorn' wrote a song called 'Necrophiliac glue-sniffer'.
*Almost every song written by the [[death metal]] band [[Cannibal Corpse]] involves necrophilia.
*Almost every song written by the [[death metal]] band [[Cannibal Corpse]] involves necrophilia.
